div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1563 Latakia (anc. Laodiceia ad Mare) environs, Seleucis, 1948 Burial: c. 125 B.C. (Westermark) Contents: 10 AR Antiochus VII: 2 tetradr. (Damascus 1 of yr. 182, unc. mint 1) Demetrius II: 8 tetradr. (Antiocheia 5, Ace 2 of year 185, Sidon 1 of yr. 185) Disposition: dispersed Seyrig, Tr√©sors du Levant (in press)
